explanation.overview: 这两个词都指'工资'，但在支付方式和适用对象上有所不同。

details.meaning: 通常指白领或专业人士的固定年薪或月薪，按固定周期支付
details.example: Her monthly salary is paid on the last Friday of each month.（她的月薪在每个月的最后一个星期五支付。）

details.meaning: 通常指蓝领工人或按小时计酬的工资，按周或小时计算支付
details.example: The factory workers receive their wages every Friday.（工厂工人每周五领取工资。）

life_examples.salary: The company offers a competitive salary package.（公司提供有竞争力的薪资方案。）

life_examples.wages: He earns minimum wages at the part-time job.（他的兼职工作拿最低工资。）

common_errors.error: ❌ Teachers receive their wages at the end of each month.
common_errors.correction: ✅ Teachers receive their salary at the end of each month.（教师工资用salary）

common_errors.error: ❌ The construction workers negotiated for a higher salary.
common_errors.correction: ✅ The construction workers negotiated for higher wages.（建筑工人工资用wages）

mini_test.question: 选择最合适的词：The CEO's annual ___ is over $1 million.
哪个词适合描述餐厅服务员的收入？
